segments.text: I can't believe what's happening in this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so intent on that plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet from the overflow, but she keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is flooding out, pooling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how unaware she is of the damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes nearby might get knocked over soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy on the stool is my biggest worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies while balanced precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That tilting stool screams danger to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up looks excited for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view contrasts this indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting to warn them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a hazardous little moment captured here.
segments.speaker: PAR
